name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Gebyar hololive Indonesia with all of holoID! #GebyarholoID [ClzYg93BFIA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Generation 3 (Vestia Zeta, Kaela Kovalskia, Kobo Kanaeru) performing their 'Emoji Dance Battle' segment.
Generation 3 finishes their performance and reacts to the 'Fire' emoji challenge.
MC Airani Iofifteen conducts the voting for the winner of the Generation 3 round. Vestia Zeta is declared the winner.
Introduction and short interview with Generation 2 (Kureiji Ollie, Anya Melfissa, Pavolia Reine) before their 'Emoji Dance Battle' starts.
Generation 2 (Kureiji Ollie, Anya Melfissa, Pavolia Reine) performing their 'Emoji Dance Battle' set to the song 'Zeta'.

subtitles.english: Emoji: Basketball
Basketball!
Okay, switch!
Emoji: Rabbit
Switch! Switch!
Emoji: Heart Hands
Love, love, love! Love! Yeah!
Emoji: Fire

subtitles.original:
Ayo, bakar-bakar!
Yang penting panas cantik!
subtitles.english:
Come on, burn it up!
The important thing is it's hot and pretty!
Fire fire! It's hot!
Ow, my head is about to fall off...

subtitles.original: Jangan, enggak boleh copot, itu kerjaanku.
subtitles.english: No, it shouldn't fall off, that's my job.

subtitles.original:
Iya, jadi gini guys,
kita udah lihat kan tiga-tiganya...
subtitles.english:
Yeah, so here's the thing guys,
we've seen all three...

subtitles.original:
...nanti kita akan voting nih siapa-siapa nanti,
ya kayak voting angkat aja tangannya.
subtitles.english:
...and now we're going to vote on who's the winner,
so just raise your hands.
Those who choose Zeta, raise your hands!
Me, me, me! Waaa!

subtitles.original:
Udah nih kalau gini, kalau gini mah
Zeta dong, Zeta dong!
subtitles.english: Well if it's like this, it's gotta be Zeta, Zeta!
Yeah! Zeta! Zeta! Wooo!
Zeta, Zee, calm down.
Zee, Zee, take it easy Zee.

subtitles.original:
Enggak boleh membully anak yang lebih kecil.
Biasa aja, hah!
subtitles.english:
You shouldn't bully a smaller child.
Calm down, hah!

subtitles.original:
Ya, jadi kita tanya tadi kayak paling semangat
Ayunda Risu, kenapa kamu pilih Zeta?
subtitles.english:
So, let's ask the most enthusiastic one,
Ayunda Risu, why did you choose Zeta?

subtitles.original: Karena gayanya kocak, ada twerking-nya coy.
subtitles.english:
Because her style is funny,
she was twerking, man.

subtitles.original: Oh iya! Bener-bener! Gimana Zee? Gimana Zee?
subtitles.english: Oh yeah! True! How was it, Zee? How was it?

subtitles.original: Coba lagi Zee! Aku enggak bisa!
subtitles.english: Try again, Zee! I can't do it!

subtitles.original:
Iya begitu guys, jadi hasil voting ronde pertama
pemenangnya adalah Zeta!
subtitles.english:
That's right guys, so the winner of the first
round's voting is Zeta!
Wooo! Yeah! The winner is Zeta!

subtitles.original:
Selamat Zee, nanti semoga di babak final
kamu bisa menang menang menang lagi ya.
subtitles.english:
Congratulations Zee, hopefully in the final round
you can win again and again.

subtitles.original: Oke sip, jadi kalau kayak gini, Gen 2 enggak sih?
subtitles.english: Okay, so with that, next is Gen 2, right?
Gen 2! Gen 2! Gen 2! That's right!

subtitles.original:
Aduh tapi kan kita sulit,
aku gimana gitu kalau kompetisi sama kalian.
subtitles.english:
Oh dear, but this is hard,
I don't know how to feel about competing.
Forget it, let's go change!

subtitles.original:
Aku masa gitu aja takut,
aku tidak ingin bertarung dengan kalian.
subtitles.english:
I can't believe I'm scared.
I don't want to fight you guys.

subtitles.original: Oh gitu? Masa gitu aja takut, gimana sih?
subtitles.english:
Oh really? Scared of just that?
What's up with you?
Anya-san, you running? You dancing?

subtitles.original:
Interpiu dulu nih, yang katanya paling solid.
Ollie, pendapat anda gimana? PD kah?
subtitles.english:
Let's do an interview first. Ollie, what's
your opinion? Are you confident?

subtitles.original:
Aduh, aku sih PD banget, makanya aku enggak mau
sama mereka, enggak mau gitu karena kalah.
subtitles.english:
Oh, I'm super confident, that's why I don't want
to be with them, because they'll lose.
That's why there's no need to fight anymore!

subtitles.original:
Oke siap, NPC gila.
Anya Melfissa bagaimana? PD kah?
subtitles.english:
Okay, ready. Crazy NPC.
Anya Melfissa, how about you? Confident?

subtitles.original:
Aduh, aku kepedean sampai kalian-kalian
bisa menang nih.
subtitles.english:
Oh, I'm so confident that maybe you guys
can actually win.
Waaa! Give her the victory!
Insane! Good luck! Show us your strength later.

subtitles.original:
Nah terakhir Pavolia Reine,
apakah anda akan tertiup angin hari ini?
subtitles.english:
And finally, Pavolia Reine,
will you be blown away by the wind today?

subtitles.original: Kalau menurut aku sih, ya let the best win aja sih.
subtitles.english: If you ask me, well, let the best one win.

subtitles.original:
Wooo! Iih seram-seram ya guys ya.
Ngeri ngeri ngeri ngeri ngeri.
subtitles.english:
Wooo! They're scary, aren't they guys?
So scary, scary, scary.
Ready? Ready?
Ready? I don't know, sis.
Ready, I think. You ready?

subtitles.original: Oke deh kita mulai ya, mulai-mulai.
subtitles.english: All right, let's start then, let's go.

subtitles.original: Oke siap juri? Kalian siap? Siap!
subtitles.english: Okay, judges ready? Are you guys ready? Ready!

subtitles.original: Oke, Emoji Dance dari Gen 2, musiknya Zeta!
subtitles.english: Okay, Emoji Dance from Gen 2, music: Zeta!
Emoji: Gorilla
Wooo! Gorilla! Insane!
Emoji: Lipstick
Lipstick! Lipstick! Let's go!
Emoji: Boxing Glove
Hit 'em! Hit 'em! Punch! Punch!
Emoji: Drum
Wooo! Drum! Drum!
Oh man, I'm confused how to score this!

subtitles.original: Aku bingung gimana nih, ini sengit banget!
subtitles.english: I'm confused too, this is so fierce!
Emoji: Clapping Hands
